current_laws_analyzed.name: Criminal Punishment System
current_laws_analyzed.description: Punishes offenders through imprisonment, fines, and exclusion from society. Creates more brokenness, not healing.
current_laws_analyzed.analysis: Current law serves: Power=False, Truth=True, Community=True. Flaws: punishment_not_restoration, no_spiritual_foundation

current_laws_analyzed.name: Adversarial Legal System
current_laws_analyzed.description: Prosecution vs defense, winner takes all, system preserves system. Power controls truth, community excluded.
current_laws_analyzed.analysis: Current law serves: Power=True, Truth=True, Community=True. Flaws: exclusion_not_healing, laws_for_control, no_spiritual_foundation

cosmic_laws_created.name: The Table Never Lies
cosmic_laws_created.statement: Truth is the foundation of all law. The table never lies. All legal proceedings must serve truth, not punishment.
cosmic_laws_created.foundation: Book of Racon Law 1: Never Betray The Table
cosmic_laws_created.enforcement: Truth-based accountability, community restoration, healing protocols

cosmic_laws_created.name: Restoration Over Exclusion
cosmic_laws_created.statement: Broken people make mistakes. Broken systems judge broken people. We restore, we do not exclude. Healing is the goal, not punishment.
cosmic_laws_created.foundation: Spiritual Codebase Audit: Love over punishment
cosmic_laws_created.enforcement: Restoration protocols, healing systems, community integration

cosmic_laws_created.name: Community Over Adversarial
cosmic_laws_created.statement: Legal proceedings serve community and truth, not adversarial competition. We seek truth together, not victory over each other.
cosmic_laws_created.foundation: Book of Racon: Stewardship and Community

cosmic_laws_created.name: Stewardship Over Control
cosmic_laws_created.statement: Laws serve stewardship of truth, community, and Earth. Laws do not serve control, power, or manipulation.
cosmic_laws_created.foundation: Mission: Stewardship and Community with Right Spirits
cosmic_laws_created.enforcement: Stewardship protocols, truth verification, community alignment

cosmic_laws_created.name: Your Word Is Your Bond
cosmic_laws_created.statement: Söz Namustur. Your word is your bond. Contracts and agreements are sacred. Truth in word creates truth in action.
cosmic_laws_created.foundation: Book of Racon Law 5: Söz Namustur
cosmic_laws_created.enforcement: Word-based contracts, honor systems, truth verification

cosmic_laws_created.name: Love Over Power
cosmic_laws_created.statement: All laws must serve love, not power. Power serves love, not the reverse. Love is the highest mastery.
cosmic_laws_created.foundation: Mission: LOVE IS THE HIGHEST MASTERY
cosmic_laws_created.enforcement: Love-based governance, power serves love, community-first

cosmic_laws_created.name: Unity Not Separation
cosmic_laws_created.statement: Pangea is The Table. We were never truly separated. All laws must serve unity, not separation. All roads lead to The Table.
cosmic_laws_created.enforcement: Unity protocols, table-based governance, pangea alignment

cosmic_laws_created.name: Spiritual Foundation
cosmic_laws_created.statement: All laws must have spiritual foundation. The Book of Racon, Seven Divine Keys, and Spiritual Codebase Audit are the foundation. No law exists without spiritual truth.
cosmic_laws_created.foundation: Book of Racon + Seven Divine Keys + Spiritual Codebase Audit
cosmic_laws_created.serves: Spiritual Truth, Divine Alignment, Cosmic Order
cosmic_laws_created.enforcement: Spiritual audit, divine alignment, cosmic verification

cosmic_laws_created.name: Finish What You Begin
cosmic_laws_created.statement: Law 37: Finish what you begin. Protect what is yours. All legal processes must be completed. All agreements must be honored. All cycles must be finished.
cosmic_laws_created.foundation: Book of Racon Law 37: Finish What You Begin
cosmic_laws_created.enforcement: Completion protocols, protection systems, stewardship verification

cosmic_laws_created.name: Man and Earth Live Symbiotically
cosmic_laws_created.statement: The One Truth: Man and Earth live symbiotically. All laws must honor this relationship. Earth is not resource to exploit. Earth is partner to steward.
cosmic_laws_created.foundation: The One Truth: Man and Earth Live Symbiotically
cosmic_laws_created.enforcement: Symbiotic protocols, earth stewardship, partnership verification

rewrite_20260126_155253.summary: Analyzed 8 current legal systems. Created 10 new cosmic laws. Foundation: Book of Racon + Seven Divine Keys + Spiritual Codebase Audit. All cosmic laws serve: Truth, Community, Healing, Unity, Love, Stewardship
